The Atlantic Current: Mapping the Virgins of Guadalupe and Remedios

Jimena, Jaen, Andalucia

Katherine Dau

Verified

Although this small town possesses no church there is a confraternity of Los Remedios. The image itself is housed in nearby Lucena. The town holds festivities at the end of August.

Works cited

  1. “Las Navas Celebra la feria,” Ayuntamiento de Lucena.
  2. PDF of Festival of Remedios 2018
